name: Bars TTR 125
description: Bars TTR 125 is the so-called pitbike - a powerful motorcycle of small size, designed for entertainment outside the city or on specialized tracks. It is ideal for teaching the skills of driving two-wheeled bikes.

name: Bars TTR 250
description: Bars TTR 250 is the big brother of Bars TTR 125. He perfectly manifests himself both on the road and off-road, is able to cross fords and makes it possible to perform jumps and simple tricks.

name: Legasi Smart 150
description: Progasi pit bikes are designed for beginners. Well suited for enduro rides due to the presence of a dashboard and an enlarged tank. By landing it will be convenient for riders up to 175 cm with a standard handlebar.

name: Yamana TTR 250
description: A good unpretentious motorcycle, reliable as a Swiss watch. Great for both beginners and experienced riders.

name: Regmoto Legend 300
description: Reliable technology from the most popular components. Due to the balanced base, the motorcycle has excellent handling, and the frame design and suspension tuning features contribute to the maximum absorption of road surface irregularities, as well as enhanced progression on needle bearings.

name: Kato T4 250 Enduro
description: This affordable multi-purpose enduro bike is well-deserved attention of motorcycle enthusiasts due to its high reliability, simplicity and low-cost service, wide possibilities of practical use.

name: Apollon RXF Open 125E
description: This pitbike is perfect for both teenagers and real fans who recognize pit bikes only on 14/12 wheels. Even a child can start the engine with an electric starter, and an adjustable rear shock absorber allows you to adjust the suspension to suit your riding style.

name: BST XT1 LIME
description: Meet the first children's ATV with a bright sporty design! Powerful and reliable Zongshen ZS154FMI engine with automatic transmission and energy-intensive suspension.

name: Motoland 200 Wild Track PRO
description: The ATV stands out for a number of distinctive features and interesting equipment, and also has a high rating and a lot of positive feedback from customers. Choosing the MotoLand WILD TRACK 200 PRO ATV, you get high quality, ease of maintenance and long service life.

name: BST Kids 50e A Minecraft
description: Pitbike BSE KIDS 50e is a modern motorcycle for beginner crossmen from 4 years old. Engine start - electric starter. Centrifugal clutch and stable traction make it easy for kids to start learning. Adult inverted fork suspension provides better handling and pavement feedback. Bicycle arrangement of brakes excludes errors in management. BSE KIDS 50e - instills a love for outdoor activities and motorsports.

name: Boltmotors ATV 2x2 Vanguard
description: The all-wheel drive version of the ATV is equipped with a unique all-wheel drive system and a small-sized variator. The all-terrain vehicle can be used for year-round trips through the forest, overcoming off-road, and also as an assistant in the household when paired with a trailer.

name: Ruslight Marten 200
description: Compact single-seat all-terrain vehicle with a powerful and unpretentious 196 cc engine and automatic transmission.
